title: Rachel Riley looks radiant in a white dress as she shows off her growing baby bump at The Baby Show
text:
She's awaiting the arrival of her first child with husband Pasha Kovalev.

And Rachel Riley looked radiant as she showed off her growing bump at the Baby Show in London on Saturday.

The Countdown star, 33, accentuated her blossoming baby bump in a cosy white knitted dress as she posed with a pram at the event.

Glowing: Rachel Riley, 33, looked radiant as she showed off her growing bump in a white knitted dress at the Baby Show in London on Saturday

Mother-to-be Rachel was glowing at the event and paired her striking dress with a pair of black tights and a patterned tote bag.

She left her curled blonde tresses down for the outing and added a splash of colour by donning a bold bright lipstick.

Rachel completed her look by adding some extra height to her frame in a pair of black wedged ankle boots.

Bumping along: The Countdown star was full of smiles as she posed for pictures at the show with her growing bump on full display

Sweet: Rachel cradled her growing bump in the chic white knitted dress as she made her way into the baby event

Rachel is just a few weeks away from welcoming her first child with her Strictly professional husband Pasha, 39, in December.

The couple announced they were set to become parents for the first time in May.

Revealing the pregnancy news via the Countdown star's Instagram account, Rachel posed in front of a board of letters spelling out the words 'r tiny mate', an anagram of the word 'maternity', while placing her hands on her baby bump.

She captioned the sweet snap: 'Pash and I have a conundrum for you... you have till December to work it out! We're over the moon excited.'

Beaming: Rachel left her curled blonde tresses down for the outing and added a splash of colour by donning a bright red lipstick

Lovely: Mother-to-be Rachel was glowing at the event and paired her striking dress with a pair of black tights and a patterned tote bag

Gorgeous: Rachel completed her look by adding some extra height to her frame in a pair of black wedged ankle boots

They went on to marry in Las Vegas in June, keeping the ceremony 'so secret' that the majority of their friends and family were said to have been completely unaware of the nuptials.

Rachel confirmed the news on social media, sharing shared a picture from their big day, captioned: 'Introducing the new Mr and Mrs Kovalev... We both said yes!'

During a recent appearance on Celebrity Gogglebox, Rachel hinted she could be having a baby girl because she 'couldn't see a penis' in her latest scan.

The mathematician first met Pasha when they were partnered on Strictly Come Dancing in 2013, going official with their romance the following year.
description: The Countdown star, 33, accentuated her blossoming baby bump in a cosy white knitted dress  with wedged trainers as she posed with a pram at the event in Olympia on Saturday.
